item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Hey there bro! the snow here is slowly melting but the weather for tomorrow is a frosty start followed by something else! I don't think I'd make a good weather girl!! I too am now a techy like you except my new found job is in highways & transportation yours is IT I deal with cones Lucky me!! Looking forward to seeing you Sunday for roast beef!!! hee-hee not really roast pork on the menu. Take care.</p>
item.content:encoded: Hey there bro! the snow here is slowly melting but the weather for tomorrow is a frosty start followed by something else! I don’t think I’d make a good weather girl!! I too am now a techy like you except my new found job is in highways & transportation yours is IT I deal with cones Lucky me!! Looking forward to seeing you Sunday for roast beef!!! hee-hee not really roast pork on the menu. Take care.
